channel.title: [NEVERMIND] Need a "Miracle" Banner - Please Look
channel.description:
Ok, I need a fairly simple banner:
[ul][*]Width: Whatever you feel is good [*]Height: 100px [*]Image: [img]http://www.bu.edu/bridge/archive/2000/01-07/photos/hockey3.jpg[/img] http://www.bu.edu/bridge/archive/2000/01-07/photos/hockey3.jpg [*]Text: Miracle [*]Effects: Make it icy, be creative, but keep it simple. [*]Other: The left and right side needs to fade to this color: #5E79EA (RGB: R=94, G=121, B=234), and the bottom should also fade to that color.[/ul]
Thank you to anyone that tries,
-Weibs.[br][size=1]Posted on: January 16, 2007, 03:39:09 PM[/size][hr]Scratch that, my teacher's a dumbass. :\
